body:
This is incredible...
She truly got her happy end, huh? She saved her friend from despair and erased the sins she committed, restoring her virginity and purity. On top of that, she remembered everything and met Negima again. The only way this could be any better is if the author writes a sequel where Negima marries both of them and they have his children, one of whom becomes that mage who sent Chisame back in time.
I feel bad & sad. Why this parody can be so cruelty :(
Let's not for get in UQ Holder, they mention Negi getting married with Chisame, this parody was on point.

Ok, this is one high tier deep shit drama, I mean look at that ahegao look on Asuna. I don't know why the author put this parody in here but theres a little bit of sex.

You, yes you author, if your reading my comment, be proud cuz this parody is goddamn gold
i wonder if the mangaka read this
had to reread it coz of UQ Holder ch137.... damn time travelers everywhere
